title: Lynda - Distributing Android Apps
description:
Lynda - Distributing Android Apps 

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 20m Intermediate Jun 11, 2015 Updated Jun 11, 2015 | Uploaded in Oct 2, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject:  Developer 
Software:  Android 
Author:  David Gassner 

Once you've created an Android app, you can distribute it in multiple ways, but the primary channel is through the Google Play Store. In this course, updated for 2015, David Gassner shows you how to publish your app on Google Play and provides a brief overview of the alternatives offered by Amazon and other vendors. The process starts with packaging the app for distribution, sideloading an application package (APK) file on your own devices for testing, and implementing some basic protections. Then you'll learn to publish your app on Google Play, where you'll set pricing and track app usage. The final chapter contains information for developers who are also interested in distributing apps through Amazon.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Packaging an Android app
	â€¢	Distributing through Google vs. Amazon and other app stores
	â€¢	Generating a signed APK file
	â€¢	Testing the app
	â€¢	Protecting an app with ProGuard
	â€¢	Registering and publishing apps with Google Play
	â€¢	Adding in-app products
	â€¢	Tracking app usage and revenue in Google Play
	â€¢	Submitting an app to Amazon
